name: Two Sided (WESTOPIA)
description:
Skye, a random mercenary, died.

A common sight, but this mercenary's death wasn't quite the end of their story...

Before being fully turned, Skye escaped the grasp of Kage, the Reaper assigned with converting her into a soul.

However, Skye's escape didn't go unpunished. Part of their soul was ripped from them. When arriving in the Overworld, Skye found that she could still see into the Underworld.

She was now... TWO SIDED

CONTROLS

Movement - "W A S D" / "Arrow Keys"

Attack - HOLD the "Space Bar"

Use - "E"
